import React,{useState} from 'react' function EducationSection(props) { const [educationExperience, setEducationExperience] = useState(false); const [educationFields, setEducationFields] = useState(false); const [education,setEducation]=useState({ degree:"", city:"", school:"", start:"", end:"", description:"" }) function deleteEducation(id) { props.setEducations(prevEducations => { return prevEducations.filter((educationItem, index) => { return index !== id; }); }); } return (

setEducation(!education)}>Education and Qualifications
